name: Banishment
text: Give to the Peter Quill player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Peter Quill â†’ remove Banishment from the game. • Discard an Element Gun from play. If you cannot, place 3 threat on the main scheme. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "In your tiny head, the line between a criminal enterprise and an empire is thin. In reality, nobody cares. All they care about is who holds the gun." - J'son
name: Budding Crime Syndicate
Mister Knife
text: Retaliate 1. The first treachery the engaged player reveals each villain phase gains surge. (Star-Lord's nemesis minion.)

flavor: "How can you expect to win when the entire galaxy is against you?" - J'son
name: Spartoi Cunning
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand, take 1 damage, and place 1 threat on the main scheme.
